channel.title: CVE Feed for Hometory Co.,Ltd -- Mangboard commerce package
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hometory Co.,Ltd -- Mangboard commerce package

item.title: CVE-2021-26631|2024-08-03T20:26:25.522Z -- hometory%20co.%2Cltd -- mangboard%20commerce%20package
item.description: Improper input validation vulnerability in Mangboard commerce package could lead to occur for abnormal request. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to manipulate the total order amount into a negative number and then pay for the order.
